trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref>对象与其他类型。

trans-unit.source: The MouseGestureConverter class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to and from a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: MouseGestureConverter 类仅将转换<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>到和从一种<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>的一个实例

trans-unit.source: The MouseGestureConverter converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" character as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: 与从转换 MouseGestureConverter <xref:System.String>"+"字符用作修改键和鼠标操作之间的分隔符。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+RightClick` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在字符串`Control+RightClick`将转换为<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>与<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>属性等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>属性</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将转换到指定的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref>，使用指定的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>与从转换<xref:System.String>使用"+"密钥作为修改键和鼠标操作之间的分隔符。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+RightClick` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在字符串`Control+RightClick`将转换为<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>与<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>属性等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>属性</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: `destinationType` must be <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: `destinationType`必须是<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>与从转换<xref:System.String>使用"+"密钥作为修改键和鼠标操作之间的分隔符。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> converts to the string `Control+RightClick`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>与<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>属性等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>属性等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>将转换为字符串`Control+RightClick`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>
